title: Our Hotel's First Manager
content: [](http://photos1.blogger.com/blogger/1134/545/1600/tomwhite.jpg)Portrait of Tom Whitephoto by K. Urner w/ Olympus Stylus 500The inscription on the wall next to this painting reads:  "Tom White gave life to the hotel in 1905 and guided it through its initial quarter century.  A bit of a Renaissance man, Tom was well-read, a devoted member of the Masons, and very active in community work.  He was an excellent cook, a skilled carpenter and loved working on his farm."
author: Kirby Urner
